thread.title: Spectrum Brands to Combine With Majority Shareholder HRG

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Spectrum Brands to Combine With Majority Shareholder HRG
text:
Spectrum Brands Holdings Inc. will combine with its largest shareholder, HRG Group Inc., in a deal the consumer-products company says will widen its shareholder base and improve its governance.
The move will also wind down HRG, a publicly traded holding company whose roughly 59% stake in Spectrum represents its principal asset. Spectrum Brands products include Kwikset locks, George Foreman grills and Hot Shot bug sprays.
HRG...
